metadata.title: CVE-2024-43896 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: cs-amp-lib: Fix NULL pointer crash if efi.get_variable is NULLCall efi_rt_services_supported() to check that efi.get_variable existsbefore calling it.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
